content: very hungry caterpillar materials hook 4 0 mm us size 6 wool 8 ply dk/light worsted in light green red brown and yellow toy stuffing wool needle for assembly this pattern uses us terminology st stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet increase increase 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease decrease 2 single_crochet together over 2 stitches or invisible decrease over 2 stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch notes  gauge is not important the stitches need to be tight enough for the stuffing not to show through  work in continuous rounds unless instructed otherwise  use a stitch marker to keep track of the beginning of each round © 2013 gillian dite head and body begin with red wool round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 st round 2 increase around 12 st round 3 single_crochet in next st increase in next st around 18 st round 4 single_crochet in next 2 st increase in next st around 24 st round 5 single_crochet in next st increase in next st around 36 st round 6 single_crochet around 36 st round 7 single_crochet around 36 st round 8 single_crochet in next st decrease over next 2 st around 24 st round 9 single_crochet in next 2 st decrease over next 2 st around 18 st round 10 single_crochet in next st decrease over next 2 st around 12 st change to green wool rounds 11 18 repeat row 3 10 stuff head segment rounds 19 26 repeat row 3 10 stuff previous body segment rounds 27 34 repeat row 3 10 stuff previous body segment rounds 35 42 repeat row 3 10 stuff previous body segment rounds 43 50 repeat row 3 10 stuff previous body segment rounds 51 58 repeat row 3 10 stuff previous body segment round 59 single_crochet in next st increase in next st around 18 st round 60 single_crochet in next 2 st increase in next st around 24 st round 61 single_crochet around 24 st round 62 single_crochet around 24 st round 63 single_crochet in next 2 st decrease over next 2 st around stuff previous body segment and tail segment 18 st round 64 single_crochet in next st decrease over next 2 st around 12 st round 65 decrease around 6 st fasten_off and weave in yarn ends eyes make 2 begin with green wool round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 st change to yellow wool round 2 chain 1 increase around slip_stitch into chain to finish off 12 st © 2013 gillian dite feet make 6 use brown wool round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 st round 2 chain 1 increase around slip_stitch into chain 12 st round 3 single_crochet in back loop of each st around 12 st round 4 single_crochet around 12 st round 5 single_crochet around slip_stitch to finish off 12 st antennae make 2 use brown wool round 1 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 st rounds 2 7 single_crochet around 4 st round 8 single_crochet around
